subSubSection.paragraph: The species was reported as a parasitoid of wood-boring Coleoptera ( Scolytidae ).
Europe except north; Germany: Baden Wuerttemberg
Newly-recorded species in Germany. No Barcode available. Images: Fig. 6 .
